summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CyberFocus gamified productivity app. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working with minor modal interaction issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepts pointer events causing timeout on form submission

passed_tests: Task CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
AI Coach chat integration with GPT-4o
Dashboard display with stats and XP progress

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - 1 minor modal interaction issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay pointer event interception in task creation form. The textarea element is being blocked by the modal backdrop, preventing form submission. Consider adding force=true to click actions or adjusting z-index/pointer-events CSS.
